name: ARPlaneAnchor
desc: An anchor for a 2D planar surface that ARKit detects in the physical environment.

items.name: var alignment: ARPlaneAnchor.Alignment
items.desc: The general orientation of the detected plane with respect to gravity.

items.name: enum ARPlaneAnchor.Alignment
items.desc: Values describing possible general orientations of a detected plane with respect to gravity.

items.name: var geometry: ARPlaneGeometry
items.desc: A coarse triangle mesh representing the general shape of the detected plane.

items.name: class ARPlaneGeometry
items.desc: A 3D mesh describing the shape of a detected plane in world-tracking AR sessions.

items.name: class ARSCNPlaneGeometry
items.desc: A SceneKit representation of the 2D shape of a plane, for use with plane detection results in an AR session.

items.name: var center: simd_float3
items.desc: The center point of the plane relative to its anchor position.

items.name: var extent: simd_float3
items.desc: The estimated width and length of the detected plane.

items.name: class var isClassificationSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether plane classification is available on the current device.

items.name: var classification: ARPlaneAnchor.Classification
items.desc: A general characterization of what kind of real-world surface the plane anchor represents.

items.name: enum ARPlaneAnchor.Classification
items.desc: Possible characterizations of real-world surfaces represented by plane anchors.
